item.title: Reading Club
item.description: Leipzig Gophers Reading Club (WIP) Every FRIDAY 4-4:20 PM CET on MEET.JIT.SI: short, max 20 minutes weekly meetings for book, chapter, code discussions. Reading list and chapter plan on this page. What should we read next (in scope, e.g.: Go, cloud, theory, distributed systems, security, data, infrastructure, devops, …)?
